data.subject: April Love
data.lyric:
April love is for the very young
 Every stars a wishing star that shines for you
 April love is all

data.subject: I Almost Lost My Mind (김세환 못 잊어)
data.lyric:
When I lost my baby baby
 I almost lost my mind ooh
 When I lost my baby baby
 I almost lost my mind

data.subject: Harbor Lights (손시향 항구의 불빛)
data.lyric:
I saw the harbor lights
 They only told me we were parting
 The same old harbor lights that once bro
